targets.query:
lastValue = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: int(v: "${block_start_num}"), stop: int(v: "${block_end_num}"))
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "BlockTimestamp")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with block: uint(v: r._time) / uint(v :1000000000) }))
|> keep(columns: ["block", "_value"])
|> last()

firstValue = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: int(v: "${block_start_num}"), stop: int(v: "${block_end_num}"))
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "BlockTimestamp")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with block: uint(v: r._time) / uint(v :1000000000) }))
|> keep(columns: ["block", "_value"])
|> first()

union(tables: [firstValue, lastValue])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|>range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
|>filter(fn:(r)=>r["_measurement"]=="BlockHeader")
|>pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> keep(columns: ["_time", "block"])
|> limit (n :10000)

from(bucket:"${bucket}")
  |>range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["event_type"]== "protocol")
  |> pivot(
      rowKey:["_time"],          
      columnKey: ["_field"],     
      valueColumn: "_value"    
  )
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"]) 
  |> count(column: "event_type") 
  |> group() 
  |> rename(columns: {event_type: "count"})

total_voters_per_round = from(bucket:"${bucket}")
  |>range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "OracleVoters")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["round"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with total_voters: float(v: r.numVoters) }))
  |> limit(n:1)
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["round", "total_voters"])


voted_voters_per_round = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "OracleVote")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "round") // Filter successful votes
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["round"])
  |> distinct(column: "voter")
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with voted_count: float(v: r._value), round: r.round }))
  |> keep(columns: ["round", "voted_count"])

unioned = union(tables: [total_voters_per_round, voted_voters_per_round])
  |> sort(columns: ["round"])
  |> group(columns: ["round"])
  |> reduce(
    fn: (r, accumulator) => ({
      round: r.round,
      total_voters: if exists r.total_voters then r.total_voters else accumulator.total_voters,
      voted_count: if exists r.voted_count then r.voted_count else accumulator.voted_count
    }),
    identity: {round: uint(v: 0), total_voters: 0.0, voted_count: 0.0}
  )
  |> group()

  pDeviation = unioned
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with participation_rate: if r.total_voters > 0.0 then (r.voted_count / r.total_voters) * 100.0 else 0.0
  }))
  |> keep(columns:["round", "participation_rate"])

  pDeviation

round_time_mapping = from(bucket:"${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "OracleVoters")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["round", "_time"]) // Preserve the time
  |> unique(column: "round")
  

all_voters_per_round = from(bucket:"${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "OracleVoters")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["round", "voter"]) // Ensure grouping is correct
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with participated: 0.0 })) 
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "round", "voter", "participated"])
  |>group()

voted_voters_per_round = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "OracleVote")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "round") // Filter successful votes
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["round", "voter"]) // Group by round and voter
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with participated: 1.0 })) // Mark as participated
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "round", "voter", "participated"])
  |>group()

unioned = union(tables: [all_voters_per_round, voted_voters_per_round])
  |> group(columns: ["round", "voter"])
  |> max(column: "participated")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      voter: r.voter,
      _value: r.participated
    
    }))
   

unioned

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|>range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
|>filter(fn:(r)=>r["_measurement"]=="nodeLocation")
|>pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> keep(columns: ["_time", "address", "lat", "lon", "ip", "nodeStake", "percentageStake", "block", "totalStake"])
|> group()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ActivityProofAbsentees")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "absent")
  |> group(columns: ["validator"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "QuorumCertificateAbsentees")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "absent")
  |> group(columns: ["validator"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
    |>range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "BlockTransactions")
    |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
    |> keep(columns: ["_time", "transactionCount"])
    |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
    |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true, columns: ["transactionCount"])
    |> rename(columns: {transactionCount: "TPS"})
    |> group()
    |> limit(n: 10000)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|>range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
|>filter(fn:(r)=>r["_measurement"]=="nodeLocation")
|>pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> keep(columns: ["_time", "address", "ip", "block"])
|> group()
|> sort(columns:["_time"], desc: true)

from(bucket:"${bucket}")
|>range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
|>filter(fn:(r)=>r["_measurement"]=="BlockHeader")
|>pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|>keep(columns: ["block",  "proposer", "skipped-proposer", "committee"])
|>group()
|>sort(columns:["block"], desc:true)
|> limit(n:2000)

from(bucket:"${bucket}")
|>range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
|>filter(fn:(r)=>r["_measurement"]=="OracleVoters")
|>pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|>group()
|> drop(columns:["numVoters"])
|>sort(columns:["block"], desc:true)
|> limit(n:2000)

from(bucket:"${bucket}")
|>range(start: $__from/1000, stop: $__to/1000)
|>filter(fn:(r)=>r["_measurement"]=="BlockHeader")
|>pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|>drop(columns: ["_time", "committee", "proposer", "ap-absentees", "qc-absentees", "skipped-proposer", "num-ap-absentees", "num-qc-absentees"])
|>group()
|>sort(columns:["block"], desc:true)
|> limit(n:1000)

from(bucket:"${bucket}")
|>range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
|>filter(fn:(r)=>r["_measurement"]=="BlockHeader")
|>pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|>keep(columns: ["block", "ap-absentees", "qc-absentees", "num-qc-absentees", "num-ap-absentees"])
|>group()

from(bucket:"${bucket}")
|>range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
|>filter(fn:(r)=>r["_measurement"]=="ACNPeers")
|>pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> drop (columns: ["_time"])
|> group(columns: ["block"])
|> limit(n:1000)
|> group()
|> limit(n:5000)
|> sort(columns:["block"], desc: true)

from(bucket:"${bucket}")
|>range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)

|>pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

panels.title: PriceUpdated

targets.query:
// --- Price Table Query ---
voteTable = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "OracleVote")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group(columns:["sender"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["block", "reported-price", "voter", "symbol", "confidence"])
  |> sort(columns: ["block"])

// --- Round Table Query ---
roundTable = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "NewRound")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["block", "_round"])
  |> rename(columns: {_round: "round"})
  |> group() 
  |> sort(columns: ["block"])

// --- Join the Tables with a Left Join ---
unioned = union(tables: [voteTable, roundTable])
  |> group()  // Group rows by block.
  |> sort(columns: ["block"])

// --- Fill Missing Round Values ---
filledTable = unioned
  |> fill(column: "round", usePrevious: true)
  
filteredTable = filledTable
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.voter != "")

pDeviation = filteredTable
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with percentDeviation: ((float(v: r["reported-price"]) - float(v: r["reported-price"]))/float(v: r["reported-price"])) * 100.00 
  }))
  |> limit (n:2000)

pDeviation

panels.description: Emitted when a new reporter submits a report without past report

targets.query:
from(bucket:"${bucket}")
|>range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
|>filter(fn:(r)=>r["_measurement"]=="NewVoter")
|> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|>group(columns:["event_id_seer"])
|>group()
|> drop (columns: ["_time", "_measurement", "event_id_seer", "event_type"])
|>sort(columns: ["block"], desc: true)
|>limit(n:10000)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
    |> range(start: -1y)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "BlockTransactions")
    |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
    |> keep(columns: ["block", "transactionCount"])
    |> group()
    |> limit(n: 5000)
